parameters.name: DatabaseAccountName
parameters.description: The username of the database account to be created. The username can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: DatabaseId
parameters.description:
The ID of the database for which you want to create a database account.

>  You can call the [ListDatabaseAccounts](~~2758839~~) operation to query the database account ID.

parameters.name: DatabaseSchema
parameters.description: The name of the database. This parameter is required for PostgreSQL and Oracle databases.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a database account.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: LoginAttribute
parameters.description:
The logon attribute. This parameter is required for Oracle databases. Valid values:

*   SERVICENAME
*   SID

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the database account to be created.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a database account.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
